AS Kigali vs APR FC

AS Kigali 0-3 APR FC

Uko umukino uri kugenda

Umwanditsi

: Ngabo Roben

Amafoto

: Ntare Julius

17:27

Umukino urarangiye

APR FC yinjiye mu minsi ya Noheli mu byishimo nyuma yo gutsinda AS Kigali y'abakinnyi 10 ibitego 3-0 birimo bibiri bya Byiringiro Lague na kimwe cya Ombolenga Fitina

17:24

Iminota itatu y'inyongera ku mukino

Iminota 90 y'umukino irangiye APR FC iyoboye umukino n'ibitego bitatu. Hongeweho iminota itatu y'inyongera ishumbusha iyo Jimmy Kibengo yamaze atarasohoka mu kibuga nyuma yo guhabwa ikarita itukura

17:22

88' Muhadjiri Hakizimana ahushije igitego cyabazwe

Iminota ya nyuma y'umukino yaranzwe no kwiharira umukino kwa APR FC. Muhadjiri Hakizimana winjiye mu kibuga asimbuye agerageje ishoti rikomeye kandi ritunguranye ariko Bate Shamiru arikuyemo

17:17

83' Gusimbuza ku ruhande rwa APR FC

Iranzi Jean Claude asimbuye Evode Ntwari, umukinnyi wo hagati wa APR FC baguze avuye muri AS Kigali bari bahanganye

17:14

81' IGITEGO CYA GATATU cya APR FC

Umuvuduko udasanzwe wa Nsengiyumva Moustapha ufashije APR FC kubona igitego cya gatatu kuko ahinduye umupira mwiza usanga Lague Byiringiro imbere y'izamu nta kuzuyaza ahindukiza Bate Shamiru ubugira gatatu

17:06

71' IGITEGO CYA KABIRI cya APR FC

Emmanuel Imanishimwe atanze umupira uvamo igitego ku nshuro ya kabiri muri uyu mukino nyuma yo kuzamukana umupira ku ruhande rw'ibumoso agaha Ombolenga Fitina wari imbere y'izamu. Yahise atera ishoti rikomeye n'akaguru k'imoso ahindukiza umunyezamu Bate Shamiru

17:03

69' APR FC isimbuje yirinda ikarita itukura

Nizeyimana Mirafa wakoze amakosa menshi anamuviramo ikarita y'umuhondo asimbujwe Moustapha Nsengiyumva, abakinnyi bombi bakomoka mu karere ka Rubavu

17:00

66' Masudi Djuma ntabwo yishimiye imyanzuro y'umusifuzi

Ntate Djumaine azamukanye umupira ku ruhande rw'ibumoso ariko akorerwa ikosa na Nizeyimana Mirafa bivamo coup franc itewe na Ally Niyonzima ariko Kimenyi ahagarara neza umupira arawufata. Iri kosa ryatumye Masudi asabira Mirafa ko ahabwa ikarita y'umutuku nawe ariko umusifuzi amuha iy'umuhondo

16:55

61' Gusimbuza ku ruhande rwa AS Kigali

Murengezi Rodrigue utitwaye neza muri uyu mukino asimbujwe Umurundi Ntate Djumaine hagamijwe kugerageza gushaka igitego cyo kwishyura

16:53

59' APR FC ihushije igitego cyabazwe

Nyuma yo guhabwa ikarita itukura ikipe ya AS Kigali yasubiye inyuma cyane. Umupira uzamukanywe na Emmanuel Imanishimwe aha Savio Nshuti ateresha akaguru k'indyo ariko umupira uca hejuru y'izamu gato

16:48

52' Gusimbuza ku ruhande rwa AS Kigali

Umutoza Masudi Djuma afashe umwanzuro wo kwinjiza Harerimana Rachid Leo ukina ku ruhande rw'iburyo yugarira asimbura Nshimiyimana Marc Govin, umwanzuro utishimiwe na bamwe mu bakinnyi be barimo Bishira Latif

16:44

Amafoto y'igice cya mbere

16:40

46' IGITEGO CYA MBERE CYA APR FC

Umusifuzi Abdul Karim Twagirumukiza ahushye mu ifirimbi yemeza ko igice cya kabiri gitangira umupira uhita uhabwa Emmanuel Imanishimwe uwuhinduye imbere y'izamu umupira ugera kuri Byiringiro Lague nta kuzuyaza atsindira APR FC igitego cya mbere

16:38

Igice cya kabiri gitangiranye impinduka ku ruhande rwa APR FC

Igice cya kabiri gitangiye umutoza wa APR FC Jimmy Mulisa akora impinduka; Mugunga Yves atanga umwanya kuri Muhadjiri Hakizimana

16:23

Igice cya mbere kirarangiye

Iminota 45 y'igice cya mbere cy'umukino uri guhuza AS Kigali na APR FC irangiye amakipe yombi anganya 0-0. Iminota yaranzwe no kwigana ku mpande zombi kuko nta buryo bwinshi bukomeye bwabonetse ku mpande zombi.

16:19

43' IKARITA Y'UMUTUKU ihawe umukinnyi wa AS Kigali

Myugariro wa APR FC Herve Rugwiro azamutse mu kirere ashaka gukina n'umutwe Kibengo Jimmy Mbaraga we akinisha ikirenge bituma amukubita ku mutwe bimuviramo ikarita itukura

16:15

41' Ndarusanze Jean Claude ni rutahizamu wo kwitonderwa

Ally Niyonzima afashe umupira acomekera Ndarusanze Jean Claude Lamba Lamba watsinze ibitego byinshi kurusha abandi ariruka asiga ba myugariro ba APR FC asigarana n'umunyezamu Kimenyi atera aho adahagaze ariko umuvuduko wa Ombolenga utabaye APR FC kuko araserebetse uyu mupira wari ugeze ku murongo w'izamu arawurenza

16:12

37' Abakinnyi batatu ba APR FC bagiye kwishyushya

Umutoza Jimmy Mulisa ahagurukije; Muhadjiri Hakizimana, Iranzi Jean Claude na Maxime Sekamana ngo bajye kwishyushya.

16:09

34' Ikarita ya mbere y'umuhondo y'umukino

Rutahizamu Byiringiro Lague abaye uwa mbere uhawe ikarita y'umuhondo ku ikosa akoreye Ngando Omar, amusunika

16:05

Indi mikino y'umunsi wa 11 wa shampiyona

Imikino iri kuba ku bindi bibuga; AS Muhanga igeze ku munota wa 32 yatsinze Kiyovu Sports 2-1, ibitego byinjijwe na Ntirushwa Aimee na Yannick Nshimiyimana. Naho umukino wari guhuza Espoir FC na Bugesera FC ntabwo wabaye kubera imvura nyinshi yishe ikibuga cy'i Nyamata

16:01

24' Coup franc ya AS Kigali iri ahantu heza

Ihangana rikomeye hagati y'abakinnyi babiri b'ikipe y'igihugu Amavubi; Mugiraneza Jean Baptiste Migi na Ally Niyonzima ribyaye ikosa rya Migi ku murongo w'urubuga rw'amahina bitumye benshi bakeka ko ari penaliti ya AS Kigali ariko ni Coup franc. Itewe na Faruk Ruhinda ariko atera hejuru y'izamu

15:56

21' AS Kigali iteye mu izamu ariko igitego umusifuzi aracyanga

APR FC ikoje kotswa igitutu. ,Kuri Koruneri yatewe na Faruk Ssentongo wahoze yitwa Ruhinda, umupira usanze Ngando Omar ahagaze neza atera umutwe mu izamu ariko umusifuzi Twagirumukiza yemeza ko abakinnyi ba AS Kigali babanje gusunika umunyezamu Kimenyi Yves

15:53

17' Herve Rugwiro atabaye izamu rya APR FC ryugarijwe

Ikipe ya AS Kigali izamukanye umupira ku ruhande rw'ibumoso, Moses Kanamugire acomeka umupira ku ruhande rw'ibumoso usanga Jimmy Kibengo Mbaraga na Ndarusanze Jean Claude imbere y'izamu ariko Herve Rugwiro arawubatanga atabara ikipe ye

15:49

AS Kigali irifuza gutsinda ngo ikomeze gusatira APR FC ku rutonde rwa shampiyona

AS Kigali yatsinzwe inanganya imikino myinshi mu minsi ya mbere ya shampiyona bituma itakaza amanota ariko ubu imaze imikino itatu yikurikiranya itsinda. Ku rundi ruhande APR FC yo iyoboye urutonde rwa shampiyona ntabwo iratsikira ngo itsindwe muri shampiyona kuko amanota abiri yatakaje ni umukino yanganyije na Bugesera FC ku munsi wa munani wa shampiyona.

15:45

08' Ntwari Evode ahushije uburyo bwabazwe

Umukinnyi wo hagati Ntwari Evode wa APR FC uhanganye na AS Kigali yazamukiyemo yanakiniraga umwaka ushize acomekewe umupira mwiza na Ombolenga Fitina ariko ateye mu maguru y'umunyezamu Bate Shamiru ayafunga neza umupira arawufata

15:38

03' APR FC itangiranye umuvuduko

Ubusatirizi bwa APR FC bwiganjemo abakinnyi bato; Byiringiro Lague w'imyaka 19 na Mugunga Yves ufite imyaka 20 butangiranye igitutu cyo gushaka igitego. Bazamukanye umupira bahererekanya neza bacomekera Savio Nshuti ariko umupira umubana muremure urarenga

15:34

Umukino utangijwe na AS Kigali

Rutahizamu Ndarusanze Jean Claude atangije umupira witabiriwe n'abantu bake

15:30

Abdul Karim Twagirumukiza niwe ugiye kuyobora umukino

Umukino wa AS Kigali na APR FC ugiye kuyoborwa na Abdul Karim Twagirumukiza ufatanya na Simba Honore na Nizeyimana Musa

15:25

Abakinnyi 11 bagiye kubanza mu kibuga ku mpande zombi



AS Kigali: Bate Shamiru, Marc Govin Ndayishimiye, Bishira Latif, Ngando Omar, Kanamugire Moses, Ntamuhanga Tumaine Tity, Ally Niyonzima, Kibengo Jimmy Mbaraga, Ndarusanze Jean Claude na Ssentongo Faruk


APR FC: Kimenyi Yves, Ombolenga Fitina, Herve Rugwiro, Buregeya Prince, Emmanuel Imanishimwe, Mugiraneza Jean Baptiste Migi, Nizeyimana Mirafa, Dominique Savio Nshuti, Byiringiro Lague, Mugunga Yves na Evode Ntwari

15:23

Abasore ba APR FC biteguye kuguma ku mwanya wa mbere

15:23

Ikirere kirijimye

15:19

Abasore ba Masudi Djuma bariteguye

15:18

Ni iyihe yinjirana akanyamuneza muri Noheli?

Tubahaye ikaze kuri Stade ya Kigali i Nyamirambo ahagiye kubera umukino w'umunsi wa 11 wa Shampiyona y'u Rwanda 'AZAM Rwanda Premier League' uhuza AS Kigali na APR FC

Umutoza Masudi Djuma wa AS Kigali agiye guhangana na APR FC yakiniye imyaka itanu kuva 1996 kugera 2001.
